Disclosure Requirement S1-10 – Adequate wages
67. The undertaking shall disclose whether or not its employees are paid an adequate wage,
and if they are not all paid an adequate wage, the countries and percentage of
employees concerned.
68. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to enable an understanding of whether or not
all the undertaking’s employees are paid an adequate wage, in line with applicable
benchmarks.
